verbose_text: Such observed vascular responses have been linked to ceramide-dependant apoptosis signalling mechanisms that are triggered by the upregulation of acid-sphingomyelinase (ASMase) in the membrane of cells XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
